Class GameState

java.lang.Object
model.game.GameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameState extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a serializable snapshot of the complete game state at a specific moment. This class is used for saving and loading games, capturing all necessary information to restore the game to its exact state later.

The game state includes:

  • Current round number
  • All cards in the deck
  • Trophy cards
  • State of all players (cards, offers, names)
  • Game variant being played
  • Expansion pack inclusion flag

This class implements Serializable to allow game state persistence to disk.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameState

      public GameState(Game game, boolean includeExpansion)
      Constructs a GameState snapshot from a Game object. Creates deep copies of all mutable game components to preserve the state at the moment of creation.
      Parameters:
      game - the game instance whose state is being captured
      includeExpansion - flag indicating whether the expansion pack is included

  • Method Details

    • getRoundNumber

      public int getRoundNumber()
      Gets the current round number.
      Returns:
      the round number when this state was saved

    • getCards

      public ArrayList<Card> getCards()
      Gets the collection of all cards in the game deck.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all cards in the deck

    • getTrophies

      public Card[] getTrophies()
      Gets the array of trophy cards.
      Returns:
      an array containing the trophy cards

    • getPlayerStates

      public ArrayList<PlayerState> getPlayerStates()
      Gets the states of all players.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of PlayerState objects representing each player's state

    • getVariantName

      public String getVariantName()
      Gets the name of the game variant being played.
      Returns:
      the variant name (e.g., "Classic", "Speed", "High Stakes")

    • isIncludeExpansion

      public boolean isIncludeExpansion()
      Checks whether the expansion pack is included in this game.
      Returns:
      true if the expansion pack is included, false otherwise
